childs.name: Underground Network
perks: Smuggler Villages produce +5 Solari per Underworld Headquarter in adjacent regions
Unlocks the Black Market Branch Building in Sietch Tuek

childs.name: Native Customs
perks: -20% Authority from Agents on a Arrakis Information slot
-30% Authority cost to Annex a Village in a Region with a revealed Sietch

childs.name: Illicit Methods
perks: Ignore the cost penalty to Annex pillaged Villages
Unlocks the Investment Office Village Building

childs.name: Valuable Trinkets
perks: +100% resources received from trading with an allied Sietch
Unlocks the Crafts Workshop Village Building

childs.name: Wonders of the Desert
perks: No penalty Authrotiy cost to Annex a Village in a Special Region
